contentrichtext.text: '''[[BLT]]''' is a sandwich that consists of bacon, lettuce, and tomato. The acronym '''BLT''' may also refer to one of the following: *[[Baselland Transport]], a Swiss railway company *[[Continuous linear extension|BLT theorem]], or bounded linear transformation == Acronyms == *[[Barking Lizards Technologies]], a game developer based in Richardson, Texas *[[Marine Air-Ground Task Force#Marine Expeditionary Unit (MEU)|Battalion Landing Team]], [[United States Marine Corps]] term for the ground combat element of a [[Marine Expeditionary Unit (MEU)]] *[[Bizarre Love Triangle]], a single by British band New Order *[[Black liberation theology]] *[[Block-transfer instruction]], a machine language instruction for PDP-10 computers *Brian Lester "BLT" Thomas, a character played by Dayo Ade on ''[[List of Degrassi characters|Degrassi High]]'' == Other uses == *[[Bilinear transform]], a complex conformal mapping in mathematics *[[B.L.T.]], a studio album by Robin Trower, Jack Bruce and Bill Lordan. {{disambig}}
